<div id="main" class="col-md-9" role="main">

# Total mortality z

<div class="ref-description section level2">

Returns the calculation of total mortality, *z*, usually as the sum of
fishing mortality, *f*, and natural mortality, *m*.

</div>

<div class="section level2">

## Usage

<div class="sourceCode">

``` r
z(object, ...)

# S4 method for class 'FLS'
z(object, ...)
```

</div>

</div>

<div class="section level2">

## Arguments

-   object:

    Object to calculate on.

-   ...:

    Any extra arguments.

</div>

<div class="section level2">

## Value

An object of the corresponding class, usually *FLQuant*.

</div>

<div class="section level2">

## See also

<div class="dont-index">

`FLQuant`

</div>

</div>

<div class="section level2">

## Author

The FLR Team

</div>

<div class="section level2">
